subject: Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Testament, a 4-year-old gelding who has won 3 of 20 career starts, appeared to be unharmed after collapsing from apparent heat exhaustion near the winners’ circle at Saratoga Race Course after running in yesterday’s first race.
snippet: Testament, a 4-year-old gelding who has won 3 of 20 career starts, appeared to be unharmed after collapsing from apparent heat exhaustion near the winners’ circle at Saratoga Race Course after running in yesterday’s first race.
